changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.unit ( id bigserial NOT NULL, name character varying NOT NULL, description character varying, abbreviation character varying(10), notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, pinned boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, datatype character varying, -- The underlying datatype of a measurement of this kind of Unit min numeric, -- If the unit is integer or numeric and has a minimum value, it is stored here. max numeric, -- If the unit is integer or numeric and has a maximum value, it is stored here. enumerated boolean DEFAULT false, -- If the allowable values of the unit constitute an enumerated set, then this should be TRUE. CONSTRAINT unit_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT unit_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT unit_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT unit_name_key UNIQUE (name ), CONSTRAINT valid_datatype CHECK (datatype::text = ANY (ARRAY['integer'::character varying::text, 'numeric'::character varying::text, 'text'::character varying::text, 'boolean'::character varying::text, 'product'::character varying::text])) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.unit.datatype IS 'The underlying datatype of a measurement of this kind of Unit'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.unit.min IS 'If the unit is integer or numeric and has a minimum value, it is stored here.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.unit.max IS 'If the unit is integer or numeric and has a maximum value, it is stored here.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.unit.enumerated IS 'If the allowable values of the unit constitute an enumerated set, then this should be TRUE.';
